text: nam'muṭe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷkk ōtikēḷpicc tarikayuṁ, niṅṅaḷe sanskarikkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷkk vēdavuṁ vijñānavuṁ paṭhippiccutarikayuṁ, niṅṅaḷkk aṟivillāttat niṅṅaḷkk aṟiyiccutarikayuṁ ceyyunna, niṅṅaḷuṭe kūṭṭattil ninnu tanneyuḷḷa oru dūtane niṅṅaḷilēkk nāṁ niyēāgiccat (vaḻi niṅṅaḷkk ceyta anugrahaṁ) pēālettanneyākunnu ituṁ
